tool.name: SAGA.sim_ihacres.4
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_TABLEout $output_data_TABLEout output_data_TABLEparms $output_data_TABLEparms name SAGA.sim_ihacres.4 NELEVBANDS $NELEVBANDS NSIM $NSIM AREA_tot $AREA_tot IHACVERS $IHACVERS STORAGE $STORAGE SNOW_TOOL $SNOW_TOOL OBJ_FUNC $OBJ_FUNC NSEMIN $NSEMIN prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.outputType_TABLEout transmissionMode_TABLEout $OutputSection_TABLEout.transmissionMode_TABLEout outputType_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.outputType_TABLEparms transmissionMode_TABLEparms $OutputSection_TABLEparms.transmissionMode_TABLEparms

param.name: IHACVERS
param.label: IHACRES Version
param.option: Croke et al. (2005) !!! not yet implemented !!!

param.name: STORAGE
param.label: Storage
param.option: Two Storages in Series !!! not yet implemented !!!

param.name: SNOW_TOOL
param.label: Using the snow-melt module?
param.help: If checked, snow-melt module is used.

param.name: NSEMIN
param.label: Minimum Nash-Sutcliffe Efficiency
param.help: Minimum Nash-Sutcliffe Efficiency required to print simulation to calibration table

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEout
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

section.name: OutputSection_TABLEparms
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: The Rainfall-Runoff Model IHACRES <br/> <br/> <br/>Reference: <br/> <br/>Jakeman, A.J. / Hornberger, G.M. (1993). <br/>How Much Complexity Is Warranted in a Rainfall-Runoff Model? <br/>Water Resources Research, (29), NO. 8 (2637-2649) <br/> <br/>Kokkonen, T. S. et al. (2003). <br/>Predicting daily flows in ungauged catchments:model regionalization from catchment descriptorsat the Coweeta Hydrologic Laboratory, North Carolina <br/> Hydrological Processes (17), 2219-2238 <br/> <br/>Croke, B. F. W., W. S. Merritt, et al. (2004).<br/>A dynamic model for predicting hydrologic responseto land cover changes in gauged andungauged catchments. <br/>Journal Of Hydrology 291(1-2): 115-131.
